title: Geo JSON object
description: Schema for a Geo JSON object

id.FIXME: may be there, type not known (string? number?)
id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset, generated by database.

building_id.description: Id of associated building, managed by the database.

analysis_id.description: Ids of analysis associated with this feature, managed by the database.

workflow_id.description: Id of the workflow associated with this feature, managed by the database

dencity_id.description: Id of corresponding datapoint in DEnCity database.

variable_values.description: Values of all analysis variables assigned for this datapoint.
